Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1065.jpg'}
{1: 'Misono High', 2: 'Evening, April 11th - Pleasant and Dry', 4: 'Neuroscience Symposium - Misono Grand Hall'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'As far back as the Golden Age, many scholars had already proposed different interpretations of the concept of collective unconscious.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'However, regardless of which theoretical approach we examine, they all share the same fundamental understanding.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Namely, it is an innate, instinctive component deeply rooted in the deepest layer of the human unconscious.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, Reika steps to the side, revealing multiple reference images on the projection screen behind her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'These manifest themselves through religion, mythology, art, dreams, and various forms of symbolism.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'To use an imperfect analogy, they are like collective experiences passed down from our ancestors, accumulated in our minds through generations.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'But is that really all there is to it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika shifts her tone as she changes slides, displaying a series of unique social phenomena case studies organized by geographical regions.'}

{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'You may recall an unusual phenomenon from a few years ago—there was a sharp increase in university dropout rates worldwide, accompanied by a surge of academic aversion among young people. The medical community even coined a new term: "academic dysphoria".', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Similar cases are shown here in these figures. At the time, most experts defined these as symptoms of desire regression—a societal illness born from material excess in our era.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Does this explanation really make sense, though?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The screen changes again, breaking down detailed statistics from various regions.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Across the globe, regions with different social developments and cultural ideologies experienced this brief synchronous phenomenon in remarkable uniformity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Can we really dismiss this as merely a societal illness?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before she even finishes talking, a wave of whispers and rustling spreads through the conference hall.'}
{3: 'The scattered sounds of turning pages mingle with hushed conversations.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scholar 1', 3: 'Nonsense. Just another attention seeker desperate for fame.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scholar 2', 3: '...What a waste of time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scholar 3', 3: 'Utterly absurd.', 4: '3'}
{3: "Reika continues her presentation as if she hasn't heard any of the whispers."}

{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'For this purpose, I specifically sought out multiple subjects worldwide and conducted several group studies based on different criteria, including case studies and geographical locations.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'When we focused on brain wave signals, we discovered an interesting phenomenon.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'In identical cases, test subjects of different ages and ethnicities consistently produced inaudible low-frequency brain signals when focusing on the same cognitive target.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'These noise segments exhibit both correlation and regularity between them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "It appears to be a form of communication, or at least it's a possibility we cannot rule out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'These adolescents were complete strangers to one another. If human consciousness is truly closed off and private...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'What caused their brains to produce these identical anomalous signals?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'What follows is my hypothesis.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The human brain is constantly receiving consciousness signals from other individuals...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'And simultaneously, unconsciously radiating their own consciousness signals outward.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The collective unconscious is like a vast spider web, woven from different streams of information.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'While our individual consciousnesses are separate, there are no barriers in the latent collective unconscious.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Minors are more sensitive to abnormal signals, with their cognition and decision-making being immediately affected.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'To prove this theory, I came to this academy island.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'After this, we will conduct an experiment called "Consciousness Projection".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Volunteers will have nanomachines injected to locate their neural signals, which will then be uploaded to a computer for analysis.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Through computer input, the pulse emitter will send specific commands to targeted groups.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The purpose is to verify whether humans, as a species, are capable of consciousness-based communication that transcends language.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scholar 3', 3: "Professor, aren't both the volunteers and the target groups underage?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scholar 4', 3: 'This is absolutely insane!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scholar 5', 3: "To gamble with children's lives for such an absurd hypothesis!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Someone from the audience interrupts impatiently.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Some Academic', 3: 'No matter how you sugarcoat it, this is nothing but a grand hypnosis show.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scholar 1', 3: 'What a waste of time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Amid a chorus of complaints, the scholars who came for the lecture storm out of the hall indignantly.'}
{3: 'The audience finds it impossible to reconcile such bizarre statements coming from such a highly esteemed professor.'}
{3: 'As the lecture hall gradually empties, Reika continues her presentation with an unwavering smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Nevertheless, I urge you all to keep an eye on the developments in this field and the progress of our experiments.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'By the time Reika finishes her final words, only a handful of people remain in what was until minutes ago a packed lecture hall.'}
{3: 'She calmly gathers her materials and exits the lecture hall.'}
{3: 'Among the seats, as people shake their heads and leave, a small, slender figure remains seated.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Why... don't they believe a word she said?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Dr. Saotome put so much effort into explaining everything, yet all they did was mock and jeer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'How dare they call themselves scholars when they act like this!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I see how it is now. They must be jealous of the Doctor's talent. That has to be it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yuka leaves the lecture hall with a heavy heart. Her vacant eyes meet the harsh sunlight, reflecting her inner confusion.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, Reika receives some troubling news.'}
{3: 'With a heavy tone, her assistant Kouhei delivers the preliminary review results of the consciousness experiment.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1055.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'I regret to inform you that your former classmate Mr. Osako exercised his veto power at the hearing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'As you know, Mr. Osako is a steadfast conservative who rarely changes his stance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'The second review will be make-or-break, Dr. Saotome.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Yoshihiro, huh... After all these years, he hasn't changed one bit.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "But then again, that's the Yoshihiro I remember.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Don't worry, just proceed as usual.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I'm feeling a bit tired today. Let's leave it at that for now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "By the way, I've sent the inspection report we discussed last week to your residence. Please make sure to review it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I'll get back to you before midnight tonight.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Please take good care of yourself.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the setting sun, Kouhei takes a 90-degree bow at Reika as she leaves.'}
{3: 'Without looking back, she just continues walking aimlessly ahead.'}
{3: "Today hasn't been kind to her, as she faces one setback after another."}
{3: 'As a researcher, she has long grown numb to such setbacks.'}
{3: "Yet, while she may suppress her emotional turmoil, there's no escaping physical exhaustion."}
{3: 'Hoping aerobic exercise might help with her aches, Reika decides to walk home.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory310.png'}
{3: 'She stops in her tracks as she passes a candy store with its floor-to-ceiling stained glass windows.'}
{3: 'Through the display window, she sees various pastries laid out, and a pair of twins picking out their birthday treats with their parents.'}
{3: "Something about this scene stirs up memories of Reika's own childhood."}
{3: "Back then, her father would frequently take her to a candy store, leaving her in the care of the shopkeeper's wife."}
{3: 'Then he would go to meet his mistress, sometimes not returning until the next day.'}
{3: "Fortunately for her father, Reika wasn't one to cry or make a fuss—instead, she would use her father's credentials to browse university research papers."}
{3: 'She would lose herself for hours in articles about complex power systems, completely forgetting about food and sleep.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Speaking of...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I think it's Yuka's birthday today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'I should probably get her something...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After checking her calendar, Reika pushes open the door to a candy shop.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff', 3: 'Welcome! What would you like to buy today?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I'm looking for a gift for a girl... a high school girl.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff', 3: 'I can help with that, but high school girls are interested in different things. What kind of things does she like?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I'm sorry, but I actually don't know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff', 3: "If you don't mind me asking, are you her parent?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Yes, but I'm too busy and rarely have time to spend with her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff', 3: 'Is that so?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After much deliberation, Reika leaves the shop with a gift box, maintaining her dignified composure.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory896.jpg'}
{3: 'When she finally arrives home, only a single small lamp illuminates the living room. Yuka appears to have already gone to bed.'}
{3: 'Reika places the cake she bought on the shoe cabinet. While changing her shoes, she notices an envelope on the table.'}
{3: 'She approaches the table and carefully examines the envelope—it shows no signs of having been opened.'}
{3: 'Every morning, the housemaid in charge of cleaning checks the mailbox and brings in any mail she finds in there.'}
{3: 'Reika opens the envelope and finds a physical examination report inside. She quickly skims its contents.'}
{3: 'The top scorer in the physical examination is Yata.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'As expected.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Reika's index finger traces across the final page, which contains the combined results of genetic sensitivity tests and neural assessments."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'After a comprehensive evaluation across multiple criteria, the most suitable qualified candidate is...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Sao...to...me...Yu...ka?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Reika's hand, still gripping the envelope, drops to her side. Her gaze falls on the cake sitting atop the shoe cabinet."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "But how could it be? Physically speaking, she's anything but a qualified candidate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Did they make a mistake coming up with this report?', 4: '1'}
{3: "With this thought, Reika dials Yukihira's number."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yukihira, is that testing facility reliable?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: "They're reliable. They've never made a mistake.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: 'Have you seen the results? They were sent directly to your residence.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'I see... Guess I was worried for nothing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I was a bit surprised to see Yuka's name on it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Yuka... the child you adopted? This is, uh...', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'I recall she had a heart condition.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: "We kept her around as a tool for landing on the island back then. Who knew she'd actually prove useful.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "I'll go ahead with preparations right away.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Hold on, Yukihira. I want to hear what she thinks about this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Ma'am, if I may be so bold to ask..."}
{3: "Yukihira's tone becomes somewhat suspicious."}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: "You do remember that the child has a congenital heart condition and won't live long, don't you?", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Get this, Yukihira—I'm the one who gets to make the call here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'I want her to live, not die.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: "Of course, ma'am... understood.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yuka has to live—and not just her, but all the other test subjects, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Our purpose is to benefit humanity, not to commit crimes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "However... let's proceed with preparations using Yuka as our primary candidate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Understood... Also, I'd like to inform you of some recent progress.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Kurono Group's pharmaceutical company has agreed to work with us. We'll have access to a new batch of drugs.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'As for the school, all the doctors in the infirmary are our people.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: 'The procurement representatives have taken money from the board of directors and will keep our tracks covered.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: "The laboratory is staffed with experienced researchers we've worked with before. Theoretically, we can begin the experiments at any time.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Well done. I'll handle things with Yoshihiro Osako myself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'By the way, Yukihira, how long have you been working under me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "It's been over six years. What's the matter?", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Do you have any regrets?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: "Not at all. It's been my honor to work under you...", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: 'And you can always count on me to be at your disposal.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Thank you for your hard work. It's getting late—you should get some rest.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After hanging up the phone, Reika sits on the sofa, lost in thought for a full 15 minutes.'}
{3: 'Then, she turns off the living room lights and retires for the night.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory56.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{3: 'On the other side of the wall, a frail silhouette takes a step back and slips on wooden clogs.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory56.jpg'}
{3: 'Yuka crouches down along the wall, hugging her knees. Her face glows with an unsettling blush of joy.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'She finally noticed me... hehe... Do allow me to be a Prometheus, Dr. Saotome.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'll definitely make myself useful... so you'll pay me attention like you used to back in the days.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Three hours ago...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory896.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: 'Mansion of the Saotomes'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Anyone home...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As usual, the living room is empty and lifeless. The maid left half an hour ago.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Guess Dr. Saotome isn't home yet...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yuka places her leather shoes in the shoe cabinet. While taking off her socks, she notices an envelope on the table.'}
{3: 'Yuka is drawn to the letter... her curiosity getting the better of her.'}
{3: 'After glancing around, she hobbles over with one slipper on.'}
{3: 'The envelope bears no signature, seemingly an intentional attempt to remain discreet.'}
{3: "But this only makes Yuka's curiosity grow more uncontrollable by the second."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Boy, I wonder what's in it...", 4: '1'}
{3: "After a moment's hesitation, Yuka opens the envelope and pulls out an examination report."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Compatibility Test Report?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'After a comprehensive evaluation across multiple criteria, the most suitable qualified candidate is...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yata?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Yuka reads these words, her brows furrow deeply while her trembling lips remain tightly pressed together.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'A qualified test subject? Could this be the experiment Dr. Saotome mentioned before?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Ah, so this is why she's interested in Yata...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'It has to be because of this report. That has to be it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'But Yata... why does it have to be you...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yuka continues flipping through the report until her eyes catch several lines marked in red.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Note: This experiment will place extreme physical strain on the participant's body and cause severe exhaustion...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Participants may experience severe side effects, including permanent complications and...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: '...possible brain death.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'So this is the kind of experiment it is, huh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "No... I won't let my best friend take part in an experiment like this. It's just not gonna happen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Besides, why did they pick Yata instead of me? I'm clearly more qualified here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yata is perfectly healthy. She could even get a sports scholarship to university with her athletic abilities.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Unlike her, I have nothing to lose.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I\'m the one who should become this "Prometheus" Dr. Saotome talked about.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm sure I'll catch Dr. Saotome's attention again if I take part in the experiment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "And I'm sure I'll be her favorite again then.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yuka glances furtively around the living room. She is alone.'}
{3: 'She picks up the envelope and squints at its seal.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "The adhesive... It's Envelope Glue No. 6014.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Thermal printer font... So the letter can be destroyed at any time, huh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Heat is all it takes for the text to vanish without a trace.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "All I need to do is change Yata's name to mine... Yes, that would work perfectly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm sure no one is going to notice the difference.", 4: '1'}
{3: "With her nimble fingers and creative mind, Yuka is a star member of Misono High's Handicrafts Club."}
{3: 'Unlike the athletically gifted Yata, the meticulous Yuka excels at delicate work.'}
{3: 'With the right tools, she can make opened letters look pristine and untouched.'}
{3: 'In no time, she produces a flawless forgery that appears entirely untouched.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Forgive me, Dr. Saotome... This is all just so you'll pay me attention again...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Even if I'm to die a miserable death, I wouldn't regret it one bit.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Besides, I don't think I'm gonna last for much too long with this heart anyway.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory896.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory936.png'}
{1: 'Hydrangea Artificial Island', 2: 'Morning, April 12 - Pleasant and Dry', 4: 'Brain Science Research Institute'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Have you spoken with the girl?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "She agreed without a moment's hesitation.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: "Isn't that a good thing? I mean, if she's happy with it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I told her she might die, but she didn't care at all. I'm just worried...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I'm afraid she's just looking for a way to die. Does she truly understand what we're asking of her?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: 'I believe Yuka is prepared to repay your kindness in raising her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "That is, by dedicating herself to an experiment that could change humanity's fate and by transforming her life into a brilliant display of fireworks.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Is that... really what she thinks...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: 'I urge you to make your resolution.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "What if this is Yuka's wish?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Her wish?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "If it truly is her wish, then Dr. Saotome, I'm afraid you're the one who's being hesitant here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: 'I believe this is a crucial opportunity for your research career.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yukihira', 3: "Should any issues arise, I'll take full responsibility.", 4: '1'}
